item.title: odin (a simple minimax based zero sum game) is almost complete
item.description: I have been working on odin, on and off this semester as my mini-project. Odin is a simple zero sum game. I've currently implemented a two player and a single player mode, where you can play against a simple minimax based AI. It's autotoolized, so easy to install and set â€¦
